title: How to Live the Good Life: The Complete Book of Rules
description: Part how-to book and part comedy adventure story, the plot follows a young man living in New York who tries to formulate the only set of rules that anyone would need to lead a life of complete fulfillment.Of course the project is doomed to failure, or is it?Each day he experiments on himself and the consequences become more and more outrageous. He confronts his double, a version of himself that lives 1600 years in the past. He even applies his experiments to his love life!Starting on the gritty streets of New York City and the plot skips subway stops and rushes down the avenues to dip into magical realism and fantasy. The protagonist encounters such wonders as a giant boat made of hair, a green-skinned girl, and a secret society of hollow-toothed smugglers.This is the perfect book for anyone going through a transitional period and trying to figure out what do with their life. It is equal measures entertaining humor and inspiring philosophical insight.
author: Fritz Donnelly
